Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pSrcHier
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Source Hierarchy (blank = same name as source dimension)

Parameters.Name: pTgtDim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Target Dimension (blank = same name as source dimension)

Parameters.Name: pTgtHier
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Target Hierarchy (blank = same name as target dimension)

Parameters.Name: pUnwind
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: 0 = Delete all Elements, 1 = Unwind Existing Elements, 2 = Do not change Existing Elements

Parameters.Name: pFlat
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Whether to create flat hierarchy? (1 = Yes, 0 = No)
